ca.ualberta.cmput301f20t04.bookatmenow

Class BookAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Book>
        • ca.ualberta.cmput301f20t04.bookatmenow.BookAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter

    public class BookAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Book>
    An ArrayAdapter class specialized for a database of Books to be owned, borrowed, requested, or simply displayed.

    Much of this class had to be deprecated due to idiosyncrasies with the way async databases work.

    See Also:
    ArrayAdapter, BaseAdapter

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BookAdapter.CompareBookBy
      A class used to compare two books by their title, author, or ISBN.

        public BookAdapter(android.content.Context context,

                   @Nullable
                   java.lang.String uuid)
        Construct a view of books that a user owns, has borrowed, or has requested to borrow.
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the calling activity, used to display objects on the screen
        viewMode - The "view mode" of this list of books - indicates how many books in the system need to be displayed and re-displayed after filtering
        uuid - The UUID of the user whose books are being displayed

      • getItemId

        public long getItemId(int position)
        Deprecated. 
        A required method from BaseAdapter for getting a unique identifying long value from an element of the internal list at a given position. In this case, the ISBN of a book can be used, as a 64-bit long can represent up to 19 digits, while an ISBN has at most 13 digits.

        Deprecated due to due to idiosyncrasies with the way async databases work.

        Specified by:
        getItemId in interface android.widget.Adapter
        Overrides:
        getItemId in class android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Book>
        Parameters:
        position - The position in the internal filtered list from which to get a unique feature of the element
        Returns:
        The book's unique identifying ISBN at this position

        public void sort(BookAdapter.CompareBookBy.SortOption option)
        Sort the internal list based on a given BookAdapter.CompareBookBy.SortOption.
        Parameters:
        option - The book's value to be prioritized while sorting
        See Also:
        BookAdapter.CompareBookBy

      • filter

        public void filter(@Nullable
                   Book.StatusEnum statusEnum)
        Deprecated. 
        Change the internal filtered list to only show books with a given status.
        Parameters:
